description: Demolition of existing buildings; erection of 3/4/5 storey building comprising 21 two bedroom and 22 one bedroom flats; erection of 1 five bedroom, 13 four bedroom and 2 three bedroom terraced houses; formation of vehicular access and provision of associated parking.
